Package waffleoRai_cafebotCommands.Commands

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CMD_AddBirthday
    A Command for adding a birthday event to the schedule.
    CMD_BadCommandMessage
    An all-purpose command that simply tells the bot to send its default "command was not understood" message to the requested channel.
    CMD_CancelEvent
    A bot command for canceling a scheduled event given the event's UID.
    CMD_ChChan
    A Command for changing the guild (server) greeting/birthday channels.
    CMD_CleanMessages
    A Command for requesting deletion of messages from a channel.
    CMD_Eventhelp
    A Command for requesting information about certain command arguments.
    CMD_GetTZ
    A Command for requesting the User's current set timezone.
    CMD_Help
    A Command for requesting general program help information.
    CMD_InsufficientArgs
    A command for sending a message informing the user that the arguments for an event creation command could not be parsed correctly.
    CMD_NewMemberNotify
    A bot command for sending a greeting message to a user that has just joined a guild(server), and pinging requesting admins to alert them to the new arrival.
    CMD_OtherBotHandledMessage
    A command for displaying a message informing a requesting user that anotehr bot is already handling their command.
    CMD_ParserBlockWarn
    Command to send a message warning users attempting to command the bots that the parser is blocked and their commands will be ignored.
    CMD_qChan
    A Command for requesting the channel set for delivering birthday wishes or guild greetings.
    CMD_SaySomething
    A Command that simply displays a message.
    CMD_SeeEvents
    A Command for requesting list of events user created or is involved in for that guild.
    CMD_SeeTZ
    A Command for requesting a list of valid TimeZone strings for timezone setting.
    CMD_SetTZ
    A Command for changing a user's timezone to be used in that guild.
    CMD_SOR
    A Command for turning on/off certain event reminders

    Standard Commands:
    sor [etype] [rlevel]
    sor alloff
    sor allon
    CMD_UpdateStatusAtShift
    A command for telling a bot to check its current shift and update its status (in Discord, the "playing x" user status) accordingly.
    CMD_WishBirthday
    A command for ordering a bot to send a birthday wishes message to the requested guild's (server's) birthday wishes channel.
